scripts.dev-beta: rmdir /s /q "packs/BP/scripts" && gulp dev-beta && regolith run dev
scripts.build-beta: rmdir /s /q "packs/BP/scripts" && gulp build-beta && regolith run build
scripts.dev-stable: rmdir /s /q "packs/BP/scripts" && gulp dev-stable && regolith run dev
scripts.build-stable: rmdir /s /q "packs/BP/scripts" && gulp build-stable && regolith run build
